header.subtitle: Multiply your potential
header.title: Access all the power of multiple AI tools through a simple conversation
header.description: Discover the simplicity of AI that will transform your life, in every word, and harness all its potential

benefits.title: Nirvana AI is your assistant platform for all your daily needs and tasks
benefits.cardDescription1: Everything at a click, all in one platform
benefits.cardDescription4: Upload, save, and work with your files
benefits.cardDescription7: Solve everything in Nirvana without the typical restrictions of LLMs
benefits.cardDescription9: Connect to your databases and files: csv, pdf, doc, docx, xls

applications.description1: Upload files to Nirvana and save completed tasks to revisit them when needed
applications.title2: Unleash the Power of AI Connected to Your Database

applications.title3: The Best Ally for Team Problem-Solving
applications.description3: While chatting, use the command to activate Nirvana AI and request assistance.
applications.title4: Expand Your Reach with Recorded Meetings and Shared Minutes

applications.title5: Need to Solve a Task with Specific Information?
